column1: 1$What is full form of SQL?$Sequel Query Language$System Query Language$Scientific Query Language$Structured Query Language$Structured Query Language$
2$On which data model MySQL is based on?$Object Data Model$Relational Data Model$Network Data Model$Hierarchical Data Model$Relational Data Model$
3$Which of the following is considered as legacy data model?$Hierarchical Model$Relational Model$Object Model$Object Oriented Model$Hierarchical Model$
